thread.title: Dos Santos to miss Mexico's playoff vs US
thread.title_full: Dos Santos to miss Mexico's playoff vs US

title: Dos Santos to miss Mexico's playoff vs US
text: > Top News Dos Santos to miss Mexico's playoff vs US Mexico's interim soccer coach Ricardo Ferretti, of Brazil, checks the time before a press conference at the team's training center in Mexico City, Monday, Oct. 5, 2015. Five days before the playoff game against the US for a berth in the 2017 Confederations Cup, Mexico suffered a major blow because LA GalaxyÂ´s striker Giovani Dos Santos is injured and will not be able to play, said the Mexican interim head coach, Ricardo Ferretti on Monday. (AP Photo/Eduardo Verdugo)
